result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mia Marie Villaverde

records.addlTxt:
10:11 AM Defendant Mia Marie Villaverde in court.  Attorney Bryant S Plank appeared by video for Mia Marie Villaverde.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Cases 22CM29 and 22CM138.  In 22CM138 unrepresented.  Atty knows about case but def does not qualify in that case, def agrees.  In 22CM29 attorney ready to complete initial appearance.  No bond set in 22CM138, State comments on no bond set in case.  Court adds 22CM138 to 22CM29.  Def asking for an attorney to be appointed, court and appoint attorney at county expense.  JA to find attorney at county expense expect reimbursement.  Court states def does not need to sign new bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on November 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Vines says defendant is no longer in custody;  ka
ACJ payment receipt, Bail Bond Info Sheet from ACJ, Notice RE Posting Bond form and a copy of signed cash bond
Emailed Byfd Co the NOH for 10/31 to give to def.  S

11:25 AM Defendant Mia Marie Villaverde not in court.  Attorney Bryant S Plank appeared by video for Mia Marie Villaverde.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Atty, asking to reschedule to speak with def.  According to Vinelink she is in Bayfield County.  On cash bail here.  Send notice to Bayfield County Jail to notify of next hearing.  If def is at liberty she needs to appear in person.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Email sent to BCJ advising def has court on Oct 10 at 11:00;  ka
ALREADY HAS $300 POSTED

REFUSED TO SIGN!
ALREADY HAS $300 POSTED
ALREADY HAS $300 POSTED

11:40 AM Defendant Mia Marie Villaverde appeared by video, in custody from ACJ.  Attorney Ruth Kressel appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Warrant quashed and order forfeiting bond vacated.  Has lived in Ashland County 21 years.  Is employed.  Has cases pending in Bayfield and Sawyer County.  State comments bail/bond.  Atty Zimmer appears specially for def and comments on bail/bond.  Def is in warrant status in Bayfield county, unsure if she is in any other counties.  Court orders $750 cash, def already has $300 posted.  If at liberty def needs to appear in person.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:06 AM Defendant Mia Marie Villaverde not in court.  Attorney Bryant S Plank appeared by video for Mia Marie Villaverde.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Atty, per NOH def was to appear in person for todays hearing.  Atty has no information on where def is.  State asking for a warrant and forfeiture of bond.  Court orders warrant, BOW, forfeiture, send notice, if no response in 30 days judgment will enter.
Email sent to attorney with bond attached asking to have def sign and return
Allpaid check stub & Cash Bail Confirmation email

10:43 AM Defendant Mia Marie Villaverde appeared by phone.  Attorney Lynne Van Hollen appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bryant S Plank not in court.  Def posted money in Bayfield County and was given todays date and time for court.  Back on the record at 10:47 set for court date.  $100 cash posted is set as bail in addition to the $200 so bail is $300 cash which is all posted.  Def needs to get in contact with attorney.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Allpaid receipt from posting $$ for warrant

Misty fr Byfd Co Jail called...stated def did pst $100 & was given this dte/time to appear...ZOOM info was given to Misty as she stated def is 4 hrs away from Ashland & unable to appear in person for todays hring.

10:11 AM Defendant Mia Marie Villaverde not in court.  Attorney David V. Meany appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bryant S Plank appeared by video for Mia Marie Villaverde. Missed a court appr on March 21, posted cash to cancel warrant and was given  a new Ct date. Somehow the case was schd for today. Atty has no info. Ct finds the def has notice of todays hearing.  State is asking for a warrant and bond forf. 
Ct orders Statewide  warrant. Def pay post $100        in lieu of arrest and appear at next scheduled intake.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Bail Bond Info Sheet from ACJ and Notice RE Posting Bond form
